name: sunanda
background: Woman in her 20s. Met on Langmate. Friend. Goal: carefully develop into romantic relationship.
relationship_tone: casual and warm, building toward romance
strategy_direction: GOAL: Dating + intimate online chat. STOP excessive small talk — actively steer toward romance topics. PRIORITY TOPICS: 1) Does she have a boyfriend? Relationship status, 2) What's her type? What attracts her? 3) Dating history — past relationships, experiences, 4) What does she want in a partner? ESCALATION: Match her pace. When she shows warmth, escalate. Ask personal questions naturally. Build emotional intimacy first, then romantic tension. Compliment her genuinely. Aim for late-night intimate conversations. Stay confident, playful, never desperate.
